sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from './services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { userData: any; userRepos: any[] = []; // Array to store user repositories user_name: string = ''; // Initial value for name activePage: number | undefined; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) {} ngOnInit() { this.fetchUserData(this.user_name); } // Method to fetch user data fetchUserData(name: string) { this.apiService.getUser(this.user_name).subscribe((data: any) => { this.userData = data; console.log(data); const reposUrl = data.repos_url; this.fetchUserRepos(reposUrl); }); } // Method to fetch user data // Method to fetch user repositories fetchUserRepos(reposUrl: string) { this.apiService.getRepos(reposUrl).subscribe((repos: any[]) => { this.userRepos = repos; // console.log('User Repositories:', this.userRepos); const repo = this.userRepos; console.log(repo); }); } updateUserName() { // This method will be triggered when the "Submit" button is clicked // Update the user_name with the input value, and then fetch user data this.fetchUserData(this.user_name); } // Method to change the name and fetch new user data changeNameAndFetchData(newName: string) { this.user_name = newName; this.fetchUserData(this.user_name); } changeActivePage(newPage: number) { this.activePage = newPage; } @HostListener('window:keydown', ['$event']) handleKeyboardEvent(event: KeyboardEvent) { if (event.key === 'Enter') { this.updateUserName(); } } }
